comment._content: See a January 1900 view of this cooking area at the Australian War Memorial here: cas.awm.gov.au/item/P02292.005

comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/lifeasdaddy] Thanks for adding that link, it's interesting to see what it was they were standing in front of!

AB

comment.author: 85122614@N05
comment._content: Does anyone know who the man in front with his left hand on his hip is?  I have an old photo at home with him in it but I don't know who he is.
